--- Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:

> Chop and Brody were about to report, well, nothing, when the air over
> the geyserous area seemed to cool. 
> 
> Chop (whispering): Brody, don't act surprised, but I think we got
> that bastard. Let's do a subtle pass.
> 
> Brody (whispering back): Right! I'm switching to thermal scan.
> 
> The hot air fuming upwards effectively broke under a cooler cushion
> that didn't move. Chop rose in the air, targeting the anomally and
> armed a magazine of tracking bullets. As he flew over it, he fired
> the whole magazine.

Nightrazor simply watched the duo from his vantage point. As they rose
and searched he looked at them closely. He could tell that the ship had
no clue as to his where abouts, but these two were a different matter. 

It is only as they got closer he realized what they were doing. The
buffeting heat from the surface would be stalled or redirected by his
presence. Here in this location he could be discovered by indirect
means. Then his attention was caught by the click of a magazine being
loaded into position. 

With a burst of power he shot foward and up, putting as much distance
between him and the warmth comming from the surface below, even as the
full clip of trackeing bullets were unleashed by Chop. 

Strafing shots ripped into his aft armor causing pain to flood his
systems and his cloaking field flickered. For the briefest of moments
Nightrazor's aerodynamic ebony form was revealed as he moved away . . .
and then was gone as he passed out from beneath them. 

For another moment ionized particles from his engines attracted the
attention of the bullets from Chop as Nightrazor pushed his engiens
temporarilly beyond what his cloaking shields could handle. But the
bullets were quickly left behind as the ship rose further into the air
and the cloaking field restablished its presence. 

Nightrazor considered firing back as he fled, but he knew as soon as he
completely dropped his shields the other ship would no doubt open fire,
and he was not here for conflict. With a boost of power, now well
within his cloaking field's ability to mask he rose higher and higher
into the air. 

He would either have to watch from a distance or move on, he was really
in no position to take on two defenders plus a well armed ship.

Preston
(Nightrazor)
